page.title: 03HONEY LANE HOSPITAL CLOSURE.
page.content: The government proposes to close the Honey Lane hospital. Many elderly and retired people live in the area who need medical care frequently Typical viewpoint to local press letter reads-"I also am appalled by the apathy of people towards the destruction of our NHS.In spite of an ever growing population Waltham Abbey has already lost its Memorial Hosp.Honey La.is next on the hit list,and whats to become of St.Margarets?We are told in the consultation document that this hosp.is old and isolated when it is on the edge of a large housing estate.I am convince that this govt.policy is to totally destoy our NHS
